//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "Stay quiet in the cage, you beast, you!" );

affect ( "npc_bomabeast", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "bomachill" )
	{
		set ( /*!*/ "SET_LOOK_FOR_ENEMIES", /*!*/ "false" );
		set ( "SET_BEHAVIOR_STATE", "BS_WAIT" );
		set ( "SET_ENEMY", "neutral" );
		
	}

	do ( "bomachill" );
}
